name: taxii2-threat-intel-feed
label: TAXII2 Threat Intel Feed
description:
TAXII2 Threat Intelligence Feed is a preconfigured set of intelligence feeds that STAXX users can access immediately upon download, and which offers indicators and insights spanning threat categories you need to secure your business. This connector facilitates automated interactions, such as returning the list of public, private, and shared collection resources to which the user has access, returning general information for a specific object of a specific collection, etc.

This connector has a dependency on the Threat Intel Management Solution Pack. Install the Solution Pack before enabling ingestion of Threat Feeds from this source.

parameters.name: output_mode
options: Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR
parameters.value: Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR
parameters.tooltip: The Feed Data can either be returned as a JSON; written to a file on the FortiSOAR server; or Created as Feed Records in FortiSOAR
parameters.description: Select the method of returning the Feed Data information. You can choose between the data being create as Feed records in FortiSOAR or returned in the JSON format (Return as a JSON) or being written to a file on the FortiSOAR server (Save to File). If you choose the 'Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR' option, then in Record Creation Playbook IRI field, specify the IRI of the Create Record playbooks IRI, else if if you choose 'Save to File' option, then in the Filename field, specify the name of the file in which you want to save the feed information retrieved from IBM X-Force.
